Skip To main content View prices View all Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods Important Announcements Explore Charleston, SC from our modern hotel Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express & Suites® Located minutes outside of historic Charleston, SC our hotel is situated off I-26 within five miles of the Charleston International Airport, Boeing, Bosch, Volvo and in the center of the state's largest retail district. Within walking distance there are over a dozen restaurants and the Northwoods Mall. Our contemporary hotel provides a name that you can trust when visiting the Lowcountry. Our Charleston - Ashley Phosphate hotel promises to exceed your expectations. We're ideally located so you and your family can enjoy the many nearby attractions including Carolina Ice Palace, Cypress Gardens, Patriots Point and plantations. If the beaches have drawn you to the area, you'll be glad to know that Isle of Palms is 16-miles and Folly Beach is just 20-miles away. Holiday Inn Express® Our hotel in North Charleston is near the Convention Center, the Air Force Base, Naval Weapons Station, Palmetto Commerce, Bushy Park and all major industry. Our hotel is an ideal place to stay for business travelers. Complimentary high-speed Internet access, a 24-hour Business Center, and a large meeting room make conducting business easy when staying with us. Unlike Other Charleston, SC hotels we offer an array of complimentary amenities to help make your stay fabulous including a hot breakfast, Manager's Reception, Fitness Center, and outdoor swimming pool that is open seasonally. See you soon! Kids eat free Free breakfast Limited housekeeping Fitness center On-site parking Pool Smoke-free hotel Wi-fi Cashless hotel Kids eat free Free breakfast Limited housekeeping Fitness center On-site parking Pool Smoke-free hotel Wi-fi Cashless hotel Explore all amenities Accommodations Standard Rooms Book Now Suite Book Now Standard Rooms Book Now Suite Book Now Reservations: Front desk: 1-843-5531600 Email: info@hiexpressnorthwoods.com 7670 Northwoods Blvd. North Charleston, South Carolina 29406 United States Parking and transportation details : 4:00 PM Check-in : 12:00 PM Check-out : 18 Minimum check-in age The highlights Dining Nearby Costa Bean-to-Cup Coffee - 24 hours a day Full Hot Breakfast Included with your stay Manager's Reception Tuesday and Wednesday Dining Nearby Plenty of dining options within a 5-minute walk out our front door. Amici's Italian Bistro, locally family owned and operated, Red Crab Juicy Seafood, Carraba's, Bahama Breeze, Olive Garden, Outback, Hooters, Waffle House, Wendy's and Taco Bell. Within a short drive you will find Cracker Barrel, Moe's Southwest Grille, Naan, Thai Elephant & more Costa Bean-to-Cup Coffee - 24 hours a day Savor the taste of freshly brewed coffee around the clock with our new bean-to-cup coffee machine, available 24/7 in the lobby. Elevate your stay with us and relish every sip of our exceptional coffee! Full Hot Breakfast Included with your stay We serve our full hot breakfast daily from 630am to 930am. Hot items include eggs, turkey and pork sausage, biscuits and gravy, our warm and World Famous Cinnamon Rolls, made to order pancakes, hot and cold cereals, yogurts, fruit, bread, muffins, bagels, coffee, teas, juices, milk and more. Great way to start your day! Manager's Reception Tuesday and Wednesday We host an evening reception Tuesday and Wednesday from 530pm to 7pm. Complimentary local craft beer, wines, sodas and snacks. Come relax, unwind and meet our management team. Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods has an outdoor pool. How much is parking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? Complimentary parking is available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods for hotel guests. Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? No, pets are not allowed at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods. Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods for a full refund? Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate. Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods have a restaurant on site? No, there is no on site restaurant at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods. Is there free breakfast available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? Breakfast is free with your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods. When is breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.On weekends, breakfast is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM. Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? No, there is not a complimentary local area shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods. What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? Check-in at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods is from 4:00 PM, and check-out time is 12:00 PM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out. Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods offer free Wi-Fi? Yes, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods offers free WiFi!
